mapper.select: select distinct user_name from tb_user where user_id in (select user_id from tb_vaccination)
select distinct vac_pointname from tb_vacpoint where vac_pointid in (select vac_pointid from tb_vaccination)

select area_name,count(*) as vaccined_value from tb_vacpoint,tb_area where city_code=#{city_code} and tb_area.area_code=tb_vacpoint.area_code group by tb_vacpoint.area_code order by vaccined_value desc
